DOC.brief_summary: The clinical usefulness inspiratory flow pattern manipulation mechanical ventilation remain unclear . The aim study investigate effect different inspiratory flow waveform , i.e . constant decelerating , cardiac preload mechanically ventilate patient assessed arterial pulse pressure variation ( PPV ) inferior vena cava distensibility .
DOC.detailed_description: During mechanical ventilation lung inflate different pressure flow waveform . Originally piston-driven mechanical ventilator generate quasi-sinusoidal flow waveform , whereas newer electronically control ventilator also produce constant decelerating waveform . According several theoretical , animal clinical study , inspiratory flow waveform affect distribution inspire gas well respiratory mechanic gas exchange . However , study fail show significant effect.But study interested effect inspiratory flow waveform cardiac preload . Thus , clinical usefulness inspiratory flow pattern manipulation remain unclear , though capacity selection different inspiratory flow waveform provide modern , microprocessor-equipped ventilator . Therefore , purpose study compare effect flow pattern ( sinusoidal , constant decelerating ) dynamic measurement cardiac preload dependence arterial pulse pressure variation ( Î”PP ) distensibility index inferior vena cava ( dIVC ) .
DOC.criteria: mechanical ventilation Volume AssistControl Ventilation sinus rhythm pressure mode arrhythmia
